channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nintendo cuts profit guidance on reduced Switch sales forecast
Hundreds of German workers on a 4-day workweek trial got better sleep, more exercise, and felt less stress than their 5-day peers
item.description: German workers gave hair samples and wore smartwatches to gauge the health benefits of a shortened working week.

item.title: Kamala Harris’s housing plan is the most aggressive since post-World War II boom, experts say
item.description: “Our lack of affordable housing will continue to depress savings, opportunity, and growth in ways that will do long-term harm to the nation’s economy....

item.title: What closing bell? It’s easier than ever to trade stocks around the clock.
China premier says he’s ‘fully confident’ country’s sluggish economy will hit 5% growth target as stimulus grows
item.description: Beijing has set a growth target of around five percent for 2024, but in the third quarter the country saw its slowest expansion in a year and a half.

item.title: Boeing factory workers vote to accept new contract, ending 53-day strike
‘I haven’t seen sunlight in 3 months’: American law firm trainees in London endure 13-hour days for eye-watering six-figure starting salaries
item.description: Law firm trainees need to be ready to take calls at odd hours, weekends, and while on vacation—but they mint up to £170,000 a year doing it.

item.title: Meta extends political ad ban beyond Election Day
item.description: It didn't offer a reason. But one can guess.

item.title: Archer Daniels’ stock slides 6% on profit warning, financials restatement
Opinion: Super Micro needs a new CEO before its AI advantage erodes
